attributes.action: adopt the same immigration policy as Australia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is not a haven for the waifs and strays of the world. There are bigger countries than us that could take in more migrants.

Unless migrants have prearranged somewhere to live, a skill and have a job organsied they should not get in to the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
